paragraphs.1: TML uses cookies and other similar technologies to understand how the website is used, in order to improve its content, security and performance. The goal is to provide a better browsing experience.

Cookies are small text files with relevant information that the access device (computer, cell phone, smartphone, tablet, etc.…) loads, through the internet browser (browser), when a website is visited by the user.
paragraphs.2: The use of cookies helps websites recognize the user's device on the next visit and is often essential for its functioning.
paragraphs.3: The cookies used by TML do not collect personal information that allows a particular user to be identified, but only store anonymous, generic and aggregated information.

question_1.title: What are cookies and what are they for?

paragraphs.1: Taking into account the purposes for which they are used, cookies can be classified as follows:
paragraphs.2: - Strictly necessary cookies (also known as essential, technical or basic): they are necessary for the user to be able to access specific areas of the website, allowing navigation and use of its applications, such as access to secure areas of the website, through login. Without these cookies, services that require them cannot be provided;
paragraphs.3: - Functionality cookies (also known as preference cookies): allow the website to remember the user's preferences regarding their navigation on the website, thus not needing to reconfigure and personalize it each time they visit;
paragraphs.4: - Performance cookies (also known as analytical or statistical): they are essentially used to analyze how the user uses the website, allowing you to highlight articles or services that may be of interest to you, monitor the performance of the website, letting you know which most popular pages, which method of linking between pages is most effective, or to determine why some pages are receiving error messages;
paragraphs.5: - Advertising cookies (also known as marketing or tracking cookies): allow the user to be provided with advertising information based on their preferences and interests, as well as helping to measure the effectiveness of the advertisements shown (e.g. how many times they are seen).

question_2.title: What types of Cookies are there?

paragraphs.1: Regarding their validity, cookies can also be classified as follows:
paragraphs.2: - Permanent cookies: these are cookies that are stored on access devices, at the browser level, and are used whenever the user visits the website again. In general, they are used to direct navigation according to the user's interests, allowing the provision of a more personalized service;
paragraphs.3: - Session cookies: these are temporary cookies, which are generated and are available until the user ends the session. The next time the user accesses their internet browser, cookies will no longer be stored.

paragraphs.1: Depending on their origin, cookies may also have the following typology:
paragraphs.2: - Own (or first-party) cookies: these are those sent to the user's device from a website/domain managed by the publisher itself and from where the service requested by the user is provided (the website owner);
paragraphs.3: - Third-party (or third-party) cookies: these are those that are sent to the user's device from a domain that is not managed by the website editor, but by other entities who use the information obtained through these cookies. Given their origin and nature, the use of this type of cookies is the exclusive responsibility of the entities that use them.

question_4.title: What are the possible origins of Cookies?

2.col_3: Obtain statistical information about website usage

question_5.title: What Cookies or similar technologies are used on this website?

paragraphs.1: As they are essential for the proper functioning of the website, the use of strictly necessary or essential cookies does not require prior consent from the user. The rest (functionality, performance or advertising cookies) will only be used if the user expressly authorizes their use.

refuse_modal.description: Ao retirar o consentimento serão apagados todos os dados guardados neste site, incluindo as suas paragens e linhas favoritas.
refuse_modal.title: Withdraw consent

paragraphs.1: Users can also prevent or condition the use of cookies through their browser settings. If you limit this option, however, your use of some features or the performance of some sites may be affected.

question_7.title: How to control the use of Cookies?

paragraphs.1: TML reserves, at any time, the right to change and/or update the information contained in this Policy, as well as the right to provide, upon request, additional, more detailed information on specific situations in which data is collected and processed. personal.

LinesDetailMetricsDemand.description: Valor apurado com base no total de validações e vendas a bordo em todas as viagens desta linha nos últimos 15 dias.
LinesDetailMetricsDemand.footnote: O valor de passageiros transportados é atualizado de 5 em 5 minutos, sendo que pode demorar até 30 minutos para refletir a realidade.
LinesDetailMetricsDemand.title: passageiros transportados nesta linha nos últimos 15 dias

LinesDetailMetricsService.description: Taxa de execução calculada com base no total de viagens executadas face ao total de viagens planeadas para os últimos 15 dias. Para esta análise são considerados dados de posição dos veículos em tempo real e dados das validações e vendas a bordo.
LinesDetailMetricsService.footnote: A fórmula utilizada para calcular a taxa de execução aqui apresentada reflete apenas parte do conjunto de indicadores definidos contratualmente para a avaliação do desempenho e qualidade do serviço prestado pelos Operadores.

Page.heading: Lost and Found

41.description: Send an email to passenger@viacaoalvorada.pt with information about the line used, timetable and description of the object. If possible, include the vehicle number or license plate.
41.title: Area 1 | Viação Alvorada

42.description: Fill out the Online Form available on the operator's website with information about the line used, time and description of the object. If possible, include the vehicle number or license plate.
42.title: Area 2 | Rodoviária de Lisboa

43.description: Fill out the Online Form available on the operator's website with information about the line used, time and description of the object. If possible, include the vehicle number or license plate.

Page.subheading: Carris Metropolitana's transport service is provided by 4 transport operators, each operating in their own area of the Lisbon Metropolitan Area, as shown in the image below. Therefore, the best way to recover your object is to directly contact the operator of the area you used.
